title: Buy Manappuram Finance; target of Rs 160: Arihant Capital - Moneycontrol.com
content: Buy Manappuram Finance; target of Rs 160: Arihant Capital  Moneycontrol.com
description: Arihant Capital is bullish on Manappuram Finance has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 160 in its research report dated February 15, 2022.
